title: WTTF:  T206 Lajoie Portrait (Centered, About a 2-3; SGC Preferred)

posts.post_title: WTTF:  T206 Lajoie Portrait (Centered, About a 2-3; SGC Preferred)
posts.post_content:
Hello, I'm looking to trade for a decent T206 Lajoie Portrait.

Centered SGC 2.5 would be ideal. 

I have some graded T206 Hof's, and other cards also for trade.

Feel free to PM if interested in trading your Lajoie.

Thanks :D
